release.action: Fix error with installation. A file was not found.
Add modified URLs to statistics count to reflect all crawled URLs in statistics.
Calculate webgraph only if we have new segments available.
Changes to URL metadata were not reflected in crawl url export after first crawl was running.
Added installer with most configurations for the iPlug.

New version of iPlug-SE. This version uses the project 'nutchgui' (version 'v03') and nutch version 1.0 for crawling. The main difference is the introduction of "adaptive crawling", where crawl cycles won't take so much time anymore'
Using a new scoring algorithm (WebGraph), which replaces the old and instable OPIC scoring. Scores won't increase permanently anymore, since score will be calculated completely new after each crawl.
